title: Probe of Travis Scott Astroworld Concert Disaster Explores Role of Illegal Drugs
sub_head: Investigators examine possibility of drug overdoses at the Houston concert involving counterfeit pills laced with fentanyl
body:
Investigators probing the tragedy at the Travis Scott concert are looking at whether a bad batch of illegal drugs played a role in some deaths and numerous casualties, people familiar with the investigation said.
Police are looking at the possibility of overdoses at Fridayâ€™s concert that were caused by counterfeit pills possibly laced with fentanyl, according to one of the people. Numerous concertgoers who survived were administered naloxone, which rapidly reverses opioid overdoses, the person said.
